biotools.summary: This software provides all possible RGEN targets in the given input sequence (e.g. exon), with the useful information including potential off-target numbers within 2nt mismatches and optional 3nt bulge via Cas-OFFinder, and out-of-frame scores via Microhomology-predictor.

bioschemas.name: Cas-Designer
bioschemas.summary: This software provides all possible RGEN targets in the given input sequence (e.g. exon), with the useful information including potential off-target numbers within 2nt mismatches and optional 3nt bulge via Cas-OFFinder, and out-of-frame scores via Microhomology-predictor.
